definition: to have a rest/to stay for the night/to go to bed/to sleep
to rest/to take a break/to stop/to halt/(dialect) to sleep/a moment/a short while
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]

sentences.english: These little breaks will keep tension from building up during the day.
sentences.chinese: 稍作歇息将会让你在白天里走出紧张的状态。
为我的歇息之处遮蔽黎明白日。

sentences.english: I bear light shade for the leaves when laid In their noonday dreams.
sentences.chinese: 我为绿叶披上淡淡的凉荫，当他们歇息在午睡的梦境。

sentences.english: No. 3 I've been really busy for a long time. Ineed some rest.
sentences.chinese: 我忙了好长一段时刻，我必要歇息。

sentences.english: Having a rest They all feel comfortable after climbing the steep and dangerous peak.
sentences.chinese: 《歇息》感受着攀登险峰之后的舒适。

sentences.english: Finally, she closed her eyes and rested.
sentences.chinese: 最终，她闭上了眼睛，歇息了。

sentences.english: I saw dozens of resting camels.
sentences.chinese: 我看见几十头在歇息的骆驼。

sentences.english: GaoHong fired Lin mother, Lin mother also want to ChengXi at home is tasted like home.
sentences.chinese: 高虹解雇了林母，林母也想乘隙在家歇息等品如回家。

sentences.english: Godliman stood at a lectern, perched one leg like a bird.
sentences.chinese: 加德里曼一只脚站在小架子上，象歇息着的鸟。

sentences.english: Soldiers profaned the church when they stabled their horses in it .
sentences.chinese: 兵士们把马歇息于教堂中时，即玷污了教堂。

sentences.english: I have found the training class, ready to the rest of the time to study.
sentences.chinese: 自己曾经找到啦培训班，筹办歇息地时间就去进修。

sentences.english: And after that he had finished, the merchant led him to the guest-chamber, bade him sleep and be at rest.
sentences.chinese: 待他饱餐之后，商人领他去了客房，请他安睡歇息。

sentences.english: The people would rest safely in his shade.
sentences.chinese: 这样，百姓便能在他的荫庇下安然歇息。

sentences.english: This is where the serpent lives, the bodiless.
sentences.chinese: 这是巨蟒歇息的地方，于无形。

sentences.english: Sensible resolution bunnies weaning, the mother good rest, keep a good body.
sentences.chinese: 明理的小兔子决议断奶，让母亲好好歇息，养好身体。

sentences.english: Let a little water， I pray you， be fetched， and wash your feet， and rest yourselves under the tree
sentences.chinese: 容我拿点水来，你们洗洗脚，在树下歇息歇息。

definition: to go to bed/to retire for the night
to rest/to take a break/to stop/to halt/(dialect) to sleep/a moment/a short while
to rest for a bit/to take a breather
to stop on the way for a rest
to rest/to relax/to take a break
to hasten on with one's journey/to hurry on
to make oneself presentable/to freshen up
to stop for a snack while traveling
to find a place for/to help settle down/to arrange for/undisturbed/peaceful
